title: Debugger
subtext: Tool for finding and fixing code errors
author: Buzzpy

description.title: Debugger
texts: A debugger is a tool that helps programmers find and fix bugs (errors) in their code. It allows you to run your code step-by-step to see what’s happening at each stage.
Imagine a debugger like a magnifying glass that helps you see exactly where things go wrong in a program.
